[[Adult Swim|Adult Swim (Germany)]] | subsid = | homepage = [http://www.turnertv.de/ Turner Broadcasting System Deutschland GmbH] | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Deutschland GmbH''' is one of Turner's divisions in Europe. It is headquartered in Munich. Hannes Heyelmann is the general manager and vice president of the company.[http://www.digitalfernsehen.de/news_118620.html][http://www.dasauge.de/-turner/][http://www.muenchen2018.org/presse/news-544-turner-broadcasting-system-wird-neuer-medienpartner-fuer-muenchen-2018.html][http://www.moviepilot.de/news/robot-chicken-106975] ==Channels== * [[Boomerang Germany]] * [[Cartoon Network (Germany)]] * [[Adult Swim|Adult Swim (Germany)]] * [[TNT Film]] * [[TNT Serie]] * [[CNN International]] ==Staff== * Hannes Heyelmann * Hagen Biewer * Silke Gelhaus * Anke Greifeneder * Matthias Heinze * Petra Malenicka ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.turnertv.de/ Turner Broadcasting System Deutschland GmbH German language website] * [http://www.turnertv.de/en/homepage/ Turner Broadcasting System Deutschland GmbH English language website] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.de Cartoon Network (Germany)] * [http://www.adultswim.de Adult Swim (Germany)] * [http://www.tnt-film.de/ TNT Film] * [http://www.boomerangtv.de/ Boomerang (Germany)] * [http://www.tnt-serie.de/ TNT Serie] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Germany]] [[Category:Media companies of Germany]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Companies based in Munich]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Time Warner subsidiaries]]
